title: Exec Producer Kris Jenner Orders New Season Of Kylie Jenner & Travis Scott
text:
Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott are almost destined to wind up back together, according to an unnamed source who just so happens to have a direct line to E! News.

In a new brief from someone who Jenner and Scott are allegedly naive enough to consider a confidante, E! News claims the make up mogul and rapper are deep into “conversations about getting back together.”

According to the outlet, the former couple, who split last month after nearly two years and exactly one baby together, “both know it’s inevitable, they just needed some breathing room to work out a few of their issues.”

The news comes a few days after Jenner broke her silence on the matter, telling her fourteen trillion social media followers that “Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi,” adding “our friendship and our daughter is priority.”

E!’s mysterious source backed that claim up, saying Jenner is “only focused on her and Stormi’s happiness.”

This particular dispatch has emerged after Jenner was spotted twice in the immediate vicinity of her ex Tyga, sparking rumours about what, exactly was happening as the two sought “breathing room”.

If only there were someone who could clarify the entire situation, on the record.
description: An unnamed source says the former couple is in "conversations about getting back together."
